comments.body: Are you adding more generic Android view embedding tests to this or is it just for touch events? (just wondering if you're going to want to use this generic name later)
Can't tell the future, I don't have a concrete plan for more generic tests, but I would imagine I'd probably fit them in this app as well to save on build time when testing.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@# Integration test for touch events on embedded Android views

This test verifies that the synthesized motion events that get to embedded
